trans-unit.source:
**Hi {user_username},**
This is a notification to confirm that **{host_name}** has initiated a refund on your order **{invoice_id}** for the amount of **{invoice_amount}** for the performance **{performance_name}**.
You can view the status of this refund at any time by logging in to your StageUp account and clicking settings -> payments.
We will automatically credit the funds to your **{card_brand}** ending in **{last_4}**. Please note, the amount may take up to 5 working days to appear in your account.
**Thanks,**
**StageUp Team**
trans-unit.target:
**Hi {user_username},**
This is a notification to confirm that **{host_name}** has initiated a refund on your order **{invoice_id}** for the amount of **{invoice_amount}** for the performance **{performance_name}**.
You can view the status of this refund at any time by logging in to your StageUp account and clicking settings -> payments.
We will automatically credit the funds to your **{card_brand}** ending in **{last_4}**. Please note, the amount may take up to 5 working days to appear in your account.
**Thanks,**
**StageUp Team**

trans-unit.source:
**Hi {host_name},**
You have initiated a refund for your performance "{performance_name}"
**Invoice#: {invoice_id}**
**Total Amount: {invoice_amount}**
We have notified the affected customer that they shall receive the refunded amount in their account within 5 working days
**Thanks,**
**StageUp Team**
Please note, if this request was not initated by you please notify us immediately
trans-unit.target:
**Hi {host_name},**
You have initiated a refund for your performance "{performance_name}"

trans-unit.target: You have initiated refunds for {refund_quantity} invoice(s)

trans-unit.source:
**Hi {host_name},**
You have initiated refunds for {refund_quantity} invoices
**Total value: **{invoices_total}**
We have notified the affected customers that they shall receive the refunded amount in their accounts within 5 working days
**Thanks,**
**StageUp Team**
Please note, if this request was not initated by you please notify us immediately"

trans-unit.source:
Hi {user_username},
This is a notification to confirm that {host_name} has successfully refunded your order **{invoice_id}** for **{invoice_amount}** for your purchase of **{performance_name}** due to:
> {refund_reason}
The funds have now been credited to **{card_brand}** ending in **{last_4}**.
You can view a log of this refund within your StageUp account settings
**Thanks,**
**StageUp Team**
trans-unit.target:
Hi {user_username},
This is a notification to confirm that {host_name} has successfully refunded your order **{invoice_id}** for **{invoice_amount}** for your purchase of **{performance_name}** due to:
> {refund_reason}
The funds have now been credited to **{card_brand}** ending in **{last_4}**.
You can view a log of this refund within your StageUp account settings
**Thanks,**
**StageUp Team**

trans-unit.source: Refund for {user_username} for {performance_name}(ID:{invoice_id}), succesfully processed by Stripe
trans-unit.target: Refund for {user_username} for {performance_name}(ID:{invoice_id}), succesfully processed by Stripe

trans-unit.source:
Hi {host_name},
This is a notification to confirm that your recent refund request for **{user_username}** for **{performance_name}** for the amount of **{invoice_amount}** has succesfully been refunded by Stripe and the user has been notified.
You can view the status of all your refunds within your account settings
**Thanks,** **StageUp Team**
trans-unit.target:
Hi {host_name},
This is a notification to confirm that your recent refund request for **{user_username}** for **{performance_name}** for the amount of **{invoice_amount}** has succesfully been refunded by Stripe and the user has been notified.
You can view the status of all your refunds within your account settings
**Thanks,** **StageUp Team**

trans-unit.source: StageUp: Your refund request has been sent to @{host_name}
trans-unit.target: StageUp: Your refund request has been sent to @{host_name}

trans-unit.source:
Your refund request for the following invoice has been sent to **{host_name}**.
- Invoice #: **{invoice_id}** - Performance: **{performance_name}** - Purchased: **{purchase_date}** - Amount: **{amount}**
We'll let you know when the host has processed your request
**Thanks,**
**StageUp Team**
trans-unit.target:
Your refund request for the following invoice has been sent to **{host_name}**.
- Invoice #: **{invoice_id}** - Performance: **{performance_name}** - Purchased: **{purchase_date}** - Amount: **{amount}**
We'll let you know when the host has processed your request
**Thanks,**
**StageUp Team**

trans-unit.source: StageUp: Refund request received for {performance_name} from @{user_username}
trans-unit.target: StageUp: Refund request received for {performance_name} from @{user_username}

trans-unit.source: You have been invited to join {host_name} by {inviter_name}
trans-unit.target: You have been invited to join {host_name} by {inviter_name}

trans-unit.source: Hi {user_name}, Click the link to accept the invitation: <{url}>, this invite will expire in **24 hours**.
trans-unit.target: Hi {user_name}, Click the link to accept the invitation: <{url}>, this invite will expire in **24 hours**.

trans-unit.source: You have been invited to watch a private performance
trans-unit.target: You have been invited to watch a private performance

trans-unit.source: Hi {user_name}, Click the link to watch **{performance_name}** by **{host_name}** on StageUp now: <{url}>>
trans-unit.target: Hi {user_name}, Click the link to watch **{performance_name}** by **{host_name}** on StageUp now: <{url}>>

trans-unit.source: Receipt of purchase of StageUp ticket
trans-unit.target: Receipt of purchase of StageUp ticket

trans-unit.source: Hi {user_name}, You purchased a {ticket_name} to watch {performance_name} for {amount}. Click here to watch: <{watch_url}> Receipt of this purchase: <{receipt_url}>
trans-unit.target: Hi {user_name}, You purchased a {ticket_name} to watch {performance_name} for {amount}. Click here to watch: <{watch_url}> Receipt of this purchase: <{receipt_url}>

trans-unit.source:
Hi {user_name}, Thank you for supporting **{host_name}**!
Your patron payments of {amount} will be debited on {date_ordinal} of each month, starting today.
You can cancel your payments at any time. By making this payment you agree to [StageUp's Terms of Use]({tos_url}) Thanks, StageUp Team
trans-unit.target:
Hi {user_name}, Thank you for supporting **{host_name}**!
Your patron payments of {amount} will be debited on {date_ordinal} of each month, starting today.
You can cancel your payments at any time. By making this payment you agree to [StageUp's Terms of Use]({tos_url}) Thanks, StageUp Team

trans-unit.source:
Hi **{host_name}**,
@{user_username} is now a patron of your company.
- Patron Tier: **{tier_name}** - Amount: **{amount}**
trans-unit.target:
Hi **{host_name}**,
@{user_username} is now a patron of your company.
- Patron Tier: **{tier_name}** - Amount: **{amount}**

trans-unit.source:
Hi **{user_name}**, You are receiving this because you (or someone else) has requested the reset of the password for your StageUp account.
Please click on the following link to complete the process. This link is valid for the next 24 hours.
<{password_reset_url}>
If you did not request this change, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.
trans-unit.target:
Hi **{user_name}**, You are receiving this because you (or someone else) has requested the reset of the password for your StageUp account.
Please click on the following link to complete the process. This link is valid for the next 24 hours.
<{password_reset_url}>
If you did not request this change, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

trans-unit.source: Your StageUp password was just changed
trans-unit.target: Your StageUp password was just changed

trans-unit.source:
Your StageUp account password has recently been changed. If you did not make this change, please login into your account and change your password as soon as possible.
If you have recently changed your password, then please ignore this email.
trans-unit.target:
Your StageUp account password has recently been changed. If you did not make this change, please login into your account and change your password as soon as possible.
If you have recently changed your password, then please ignore this email.

trans-unit.source:
Hi **@{user_username}**,
**@{host_username}** has deleted/removed the **{tier_name}** tier. We have cancelled your current subscription ({sub_id}). It will come into effect immediately. You'll recieve and e-mail shortly confirming the un-subscription.
Thanks, StageUp
trans-unit.target:
Hi **@{user_username}**,
**@{host_username}** has deleted/removed the **{tier_name}** tier. We have cancelled your current subscription ({sub_id}). It will come into effect immediately. You'll recieve and e-mail shortly confirming the un-subscription.
Thanks, StageUp

trans-unit.source:
Hi @{user_username},
This is a receipt of your un-subscription from **@{host_username}**'s patron tier, **{tier_name}**. You'll no longer be charged for this subscription & this subscription will be listed as 'Cancelled' on your account from now on.
Thanks, StageUp
trans-unit.target:
Hi @{user_username},
This is a receipt of your un-subscription from **@{host_username}**'s patron tier, **{tier_name}**. You'll no longer be charged for this subscription & this subscription will be listed as 'Cancelled' on your account from now on.
Thanks, StageUp

trans-unit.source:
Hello **{host_name}**,
You have deleted your performance: **{performance_name}** which was scheduled on **{performance_premiere_date}**
We have initiated refunds to all customers who purchased tickets to this event. Fund will be automatically credited into their account within 5 working days.
Thanks,
**StageUp Team**
trans-unit.target:
Hello **{host_name}**,
You have deleted your performance: **{performance_name}** which was scheduled on **{performance_premiere_date}**
We have initiated refunds to all customers who purchased tickets to this event. Fund will be automatically credited into their account within 5 working days.
Thanks,
**StageUp Team**

trans-unit.source:
Hi **{user_username}**,
Unfortunately, {host_name} has had to cancel the performance: {performance_name}.
We have initiated a refund on your ticket purchased on { ticket_purchase_date }.
Invoice#: { invoice_id } Ticket Price: { ticket_amount }
We will automatically credit the funds to your **{card_brand}** ending in **{last_4}**. Please note, it may take up to 5 working days for your account to be credited.
Thanks,
**StageUp Team**
trans-unit.target:
Hi **{user_username}**,
Unfortunately, {host_name} has had to cancel the performance: {performance_name}.

**StageUp Team**
